intro: Daphne skottsbergiana, commonly known as the Skottsberg daphne, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Thymelaeaceae and is characterized by its evergreen shrub form. The plant produces clusters of fragrant, white to pinkish flowers during the summer months. Its leaves are narrow and glossy, providing an attractive appearance throughout the year. Daphne skottsbergiana is valued in horticulture for its ornamental qualities and relatively low maintenance requirements.
